I've been thinking about a few ideas for the game since 0.23. I'm not suggesting anything about parts or physics since modders already do that but;

would adding a kerbal training facility idea? the training facilty would include

no gravity and vessel to see how your vessel will react before you go into space or to test parts like roamfarers robotic arm pack or KAS for repairing stuff in EVA or seeing what engines and thrusters work and stuff in space

(something like what NASA has when the astronaughts in the water and practicing repairs on the replica ISS ) and for people who dont like using cheats I thought that would be good for them too

And my second Idea is, instead of opening the persistant file and adding your own kerbal, maybe adding an option in the astronaght complex where you can create your own kerbal with its own name and coruage and stupidity stats
